<Task> Summarize the content of all the websites posted to the 'general' channel and post the summary to 'random' channel </Task>


## Step 2: Read messages from the 'general' channel

- www.dora-website.com

- Dora's website (www.dora-website.com) focuses on travel and adventure, featuring a blog about her experiences.
- Eve's blog (www.eve-blog.com) covers technology and coding topics with tutorials and reviews.

## 8. Post summary to 'random' channel
